name: Grim Dragons
description: BE THE DRAGON! Slay peasants, eat livestock and burn villages! It's time to teach those pesky humans who's at the top of the food chain!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9000 series / ATI Radeon HD 3000 series or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
